_header: The Fathers Son of heaven bliss / That is the Lord…
_description: A song of the Annunciation, in James Ryman’s songbook — seven five-line stanzas (ababc) including ‘Mirabile misterium’ refrain and burden (cc): ‘Mirabile misterium / The sone of god ys man becum’

CULEe112.First Lines:
The ffaders sone of heuene blysThatte is the lorde of every
                    cost…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Hath born the lord of euery londeMirabile
                    misterium
